function.name: weather_16_day_forecast
function.description: Provides a daily weather forecast for up to 16 days in advance, including current conditions and future predictions.

lang.description: Language for weather description

function.name: weatherapi_com_forecast_weather_api
function.description:
The Forecast Weather API method provides access to up to 14 days of weather forecasts and alerts in JSON format. The returned data includes:

* Astronomy data
* Day-by-day weather forecasts
* Hourly interval weather information
* Weather alerts

This data is specific to a given city.

q.description:
Query parameter based on which data is sent back. It could be following:

Latitude and Longitude (Decimal degree) e.g: q=48.8567,2.3508
city name e.g.: q=Paris
US zip e.g.: q=10001
UK postcode e.g: q=SW1
Canada postal code e.g: q=G2J
metar:<metar code> e.g: q=metar:EGLL
iata:<3 digit airport code> e.g: q=iata:DXB
auto:ip IP lookup e.g: q=auto:ip
IP address (IPv4 and IPv6 supported) e.g: q=100.0.0.1

days.description: Number of days of forecast required.

dt.description: If passing 'dt', it should be between today and next 10 day in yyyy-MM-dd format.

lang.description: Returns 'condition:text' field in API in the desired language

function.name: world_weather_online_api_short_term_forecast_pro
function.description: This API provides access to weather data for over 4 million cities worldwide, including forecasts for temperature, precipitation, and wind speed. The API also offers additional features, including air quality data, weather alerts, and monthly climate averages. Users can customize their forecast by specifying a city name, latitude/longitude coordinates, or zip code.

function.name: weather_forecast_14_days_get_forecastdata_by_lat_lon
function.description: This tool generates a 14-day weather forecast for a specified geographic location, identified by its latitude (Lat) and longitude (Lon) coordinates. The output includes predicted weather conditions for each day of the forecast period.

function.name: weather_forecast_14_days_get_forecastdata_by_lat_lon
function.description: This tool generates a 14-day weather forecast for a specified geographic location, identified by its latitude (Lat) and longitude (Lon) coordinates. The output includes predicted weather conditions for each day of the forecast period.

function.name: forecast_rapidapigetforecastsummarybycoordinates
function.description: This tool provides access to forecast summary data, allowing users to retrieve relevant information related to forecasts.

function.name: weatherapi_com_forecast_weather_api
function.description:
The Forecast Weather API method provides access to up to 14 days of weather forecasts and alerts in JSON format. The returned data includes:

* Astronomy data
* Day-by-day weather forecasts
* Hourly interval weather information
* Weather alerts

This data is specific to a given city.

q.description:
Query parameter based on which data is sent back. It could be following:

Latitude and Longitude (Decimal degree) e.g: q=48.8567,2.3508
city name e.g.: q=Paris
US zip e.g.: q=10001
UK postcode e.g: q=SW1
Canada postal code e.g: q=G2J
metar:<metar code> e.g: q=metar:EGLL
iata:<3 digit airport code> e.g: q=iata:DXB
auto:ip IP lookup e.g: q=auto:ip
IP address (IPv4 and IPv6 supported) e.g: q=100.0.0.1

days.description: Number of days of forecast required.

dt.description: If passing 'dt', it should be between today and next 10 day in yyyy-MM-dd format.

lang.description: Returns 'condition:text' field in API in the desired language

original_tools.name: weatherapi_com_forecast_weather_api
original_tools.description: Forecast weather API method returns upto next 14 day weather forecast and weather alert as json. It contains astronomy data, day weather forecast and hourly interval weather information for a given city.

q.description:
Query parameter based on which data is sent back. It could be following:

Latitude and Longitude (Decimal degree) e.g: q=48.8567,2.3508
city name e.g.: q=Paris
US zip e.g.: q=10001
UK postcode e.g: q=SW1
Canada postal code e.g: q=G2J
metar:<metar code> e.g: q=metar:EGLL
iata:<3 digit airport code> e.g: q=iata:DXB
auto:ip IP lookup e.g: q=auto:ip
IP address (IPv4 and IPv6 supported) e.g: q=100.0.0.1

days.description: Number of days of forecast required.

dt.description: If passing 'dt', it should be between today and next 10 day in yyyy-MM-dd format.

lang.description: Returns 'condition:text' field in API in the desired language

function.name: world_weather_online_api_short_term_forecast_pro
function.description: This API provides access to weather data for over 4 million cities worldwide, including forecasts for temperature, precipitation, and wind speed. lang.description: Language for weather description

function.name: weatherapi_com_forecast_weather_api
function.description:
The Forecast Weather API method provides access to up to 14 days of weather forecasts and alerts in JSON format. The returned data includes:

* Astronomy data
* Day-by-day weather forecasts
* Hourly interval weather information
* Weather alerts

This data is specific to a given city.

q.description:
Query parameter based on which data is sent back. It could be following:

Latitude and Longitude (Decimal degree) e.g: q=48.8567,2.3508
city name e.g.: q=Paris
US zip e.g.: q=10001
UK postcode e.g: q=SW1
Canada postal code e.g: q=G2J
metar:<metar code> e.g: q=metar:EGLL
iata:<3 digit airport code> e.g: q=iata:DXB
auto:ip IP lookup e.g: q=auto:ip
IP address (IPv4 and IPv6 supported) e.g: q=100.0.0.1

days.description: Number of days of forecast required.

dt.description: If passing 'dt', it should be between today and next 10 day in yyyy-MM-dd format.

lang.description: Returns 'condition:text' field in API in the desired language

function.description: This tool provides access to forecast summary data, allowing users to retrieve relevant information related to forecasts.

function.name: weatherapi_com_forecast_weather_api
function.description:
The Forecast Weather API method provides access to up to 14 days of weather forecasts and alerts in JSON format. The returned data includes:

* Astronomy data
* Day-by-day weather forecasts
* Hourly interval weather information
* Weather alerts

This data is specific to a given city.

q.description:
Query parameter based on which data is sent back. It could be following:

Latitude and Longitude (Decimal degree) e.g: q=48.8567,2.3508
city name e.g.: q=Paris
US zip e.g.: q=10001
UK postcode e.g: q=SW1
Canada postal code e.g: q=G2J
metar:<metar code> e.g: q=metar:EGLL
iata:<3 digit airport code> e.g: q=iata:DXB
auto:ip IP lookup e.g: q=auto:ip
IP address (IPv4 and IPv6 supported) e.g: q=100.0.0.1

days.description: Number of days of forecast required.

dt.description: If passing 'dt', it should be between today and next 10 day in yyyy-MM-dd format.

lang.description: Returns 'condition:text' field in API in the desired language

original_tools.name: weatherapi_com_forecast_weather_api
original_tools.description: Forecast weather API method returns upto next 14 day weather forecast and weather alert as json. It contains astronomy data, day weather forecast and hourly interval weather information for a given city.

q.description:
Query parameter based on which data is sent back. It could be following:

Latitude and Longitude (Decimal degree) e.g: q=48.8567,2.3508
city name e.g.: q=Paris
US zip e.g.: q=10001
UK postcode e.g: q=SW1
Canada postal code e.g: q=G2J
metar:<metar code> e.g: q=metar:EGLL
iata:<3 digit airport code> e.g: q=iata:DXB
auto:ip IP lookup e.g: q=auto:ip
IP address (IPv4 and IPv6 supported) e.g: q=100.0.0.1

days.description: Number of days of forecast required.

dt.description: If passing 'dt', it should be between today and next 10 day in yyyy-MM-dd format.

lang.description: Returns 'condition:text' field in API in the desired language

* Astronomy data
* Day-by-day weather forecasts
* Hourly interval weather information
* Weather alerts

This data is specific to a given city.

q.description:
Query parameter based on which data is sent back. It could be following:

Latitude and Longitude (Decimal degree) e.g: q=48.8567,2.3508
city name e.g.: q=Paris
US zip e.g.: q=10001
UK postcode e.g: q=SW1
Canada postal code e.g: q=G2J
metar:<metar code> e.g: q=metar:EGLL
iata:<3 digit airport code> e.g: q=iata:DXB
auto:ip IP lookup e.g: q=auto:ip
IP address (IPv4 and IPv6 supported) e.g: q=100.0.0.1

days.description: Number of days of forecast required.

dt.description: If passing 'dt', it should be between today and next 10 day in yyyy-MM-dd format.

lang.description: Returns 'condition:text' field in API in the desired language

function.name: world_weather_online_api_short_term_forecast_pro
function.description: This API provides access to weather data for over 4 million cities worldwide, including forecasts for temperature, precipitation, and wind speed. The API also offers additional features, including air quality data, weather alerts, and monthly climate averages. Users can customize their forecast by specifying a city name, latitude/longitude coordinates, or zip code.

function.name: weatherapi_com_forecast_weather_api
function.description:
The Forecast Weather API method provides access to up to 14 days of weather forecasts and alerts in JSON format. The returned data includes:

* Astronomy data
* Day-by-day weather forecasts
* Hourly interval weather information
* Weather alerts

This data is specific to a given city.

q.description:
Query parameter based on which data is sent back. It could be following:

Latitude and Longitude (Decimal degree) e.g: q=48.8567,2.3508
city name e.g.: q=Paris
US zip e.g.: q=10001
UK postcode e.g: q=SW1
Canada postal code e.g: q=G2J
metar:<metar code> e.g: q=metar:EGLL
iata:<3 digit airport code> e.g: q=iata:DXB
auto:ip IP lookup e.g: q=auto:ip
IP address (IPv4 and IPv6 supported) e.g: q=100.0.0.1

days.description: Number of days of forecast required.

dt.description: If passing 'dt', it should be between today and next 10 day in yyyy-MM-dd format.

lang.description: Returns 'condition:text' field in API in the desired language

function.name: weatherapi_com_forecast_weather_api
function.description:
The Forecast Weather API method provides access to up to 14 days of weather forecasts and alerts in JSON format. The returned data includes:

* Astronomy data
* Day-by-day weather forecasts
* Hourly interval weather information
* Weather alerts

This data is specific to a given city.

q.description:
Query parameter based on which data is sent back. It could be following:

Latitude and Longitude (Decimal degree) e.g: q=48.8567,2.3508
city name e.g.: q=Paris
US zip e.g.: q=10001
UK postcode e.g: q=SW1
Canada postal code e.g: q=G2J
metar:<metar code> e.g: q=metar:EGLL
iata:<3 digit airport code> e.g: q=iata:DXB
auto:ip IP lookup e.g: q=auto:ip
IP address (IPv4 and IPv6 supported) e.g: q=100.0.0.1

days.description: Number of days of forecast required.

dt.description: If passing 'dt', it should be between today and next 10 day in yyyy-MM-dd format.

lang.description: Returns 'condition:text' field in API in the desired language
